resources.string: I\'m often told: "The best way to resolve one's problems is to forget them. "
What do I want to forget?
In spite of my efforts, only time can erase memories.

Everything is so unstable around me. Changing. Moving. I\'ve become disorientated. Yet everyone tells me: “You have to adapt”. Be mobile. Flexible. Time is accelerating and you have to move with the times. Network, speed, mobility. Here are the keywords. But everything goes too fast. I can\'t relate the story of my life anymore. At least not in a linear way. I go off the track. I might not have the right profile (or so my online friends say about me). I\'m behind the times.Come on, move on. I have to adapt…
Everything is so unstable around me.
Everything is so changing around me.
Everything is so unstable around me. changing. Moving. I\'ve become disorientated.
Everything is so unstable around me. changing. Moving. I\'ve become disorientated. Yet everyone tells me :

Everything is so unstable around me. changing. Moving. I\'ve become disorientated.Yet everyone tells me : “You have to adapt”. Be FLEXIBLE.

Everything is so unstable around me. Changing. Moving. I\'ve become disorientated. Yet everyone tells me : “You have to adapt”. Be mobile. Flexible. Time is accelerating … and you have to move with the times. Network, speed, mobility.

Time is accelerating … and you have to move with the times. Network, speed, mobility. Here are the keywords. But everything goes too fast. I can’t relate the story of my life anymore. At least not in a linear way.

Everything is so unstable around me. Changing. Moving. I\'ve become disorientated. Yet everyone tells me : “You have to adapt”. Be mobile. Flexible. Time is accelerating … and you have to move with the times. Network, speed, mobility. Here are the keywords. But everything goes too fast. I can\'t relate the story of my life anymore. At least not in a linear way. I go off the track. I might not have the right profile (or so my online friends say about me). I\'m not from my time.

Everything is so unstable around me. Changing. Moving. I\'ve become disorientated. Yet everyone tells me : “You have to adapt”. Be mobile. Flexible. Time is accelerating … and you have to move with the times. Network, speed, mobility. Here are the keywords. But everything goes too fast. I can\'t relate the story of my life anymore. At least not in a linear way. I go off the track. I might not have the right profile (or so my online friends say about me). I\'m behind the times. Come on, move on.

Everything is so unstable around me. Changing. Moving. I\'ve become disorientated. Yet everyone tells me : “You have to adapt”. Be mobile. Flexible. Time is accelerating … and you have to move with the times. Network, speed, mobility. Here are the keywords. But everything goes too fast. I can\'t relate the story of my life anymore. At least not in a linear way. I go off the track. I might not have the right profile (or so my online friends say about me). I\'mbehind the times. Come on, move on. I have to adapt…
I have to be more dynamic. I need to give myself a shake…
Everything seems opaque. I\'m looking for lighting to find my way.
I\'m afraid not to know how to adapt, but above all I have to change the frame to expand my field of vision…

What might acting mean in the digital area of compulsive interactivity? The digital creation “Dare” offers four interactive experiences: Adapt, Shake, Erase and Lighten. 
 
 
 Credits: 
 Serge Bouchardon 
 Rebecca Fribourg 
 Raphaël Kovacic
